item.title: A Whale Dumps Last 100 Bitcoins, Profits About $12 Million in Total
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring of lookonchain, the Whale address 1EGQSh deposited its remaining 100 BTC (approximately $11.88 million) into Binance an hour ago, achieving a total profit of around $12 million (+65%).

item.title: An address that has been dormant for over 14 years has been activated, containing 3962 bitcoins
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by whale_alert, an address that had been dormant for fourteen and a half years was activated and it was holding 3,962 BTC (with a value of $4,680,469,310).

item.title: Bitget Research: Shitcoin Season Index Showing an Uptrend, Funds May Short-Term Rotate to Shitcoins
item.description: On July 24th, Ryan Lee, the chief analyst of the Bitget Research Institute, stated that recently, Bitcoin's dominance has dropped to the range of 59%-61%. Meanwhile, the Altseason Index has shown an upward trend, indicating that funds are flowing into mainstream altcoins such as Ethereum, XRP, Solana, and other altcoins, with recent gains of 20%-40%.Ryan Lee pointed out that "The active performance of the AI, RWA, and Memecoin sectors also demonstrates that the market is highly focused on specific narratives. However, the Altseason Index has not yet broken through the 75% confirmation threshold. The current market trend is more likely to be a phased rotation rather than the full launch of the altseason. To sustain the market trend into the later stages of the third quarter, the key lies in whether Bitcoin's market dominance can remain below 60%. Additionally, signals confirming the start of the altseason include institutional fund inflows, regulatory positivity, and fundamental impro

item.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $118,000 Again
item.description: On July 24th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin once again fell below $118,000, with a 24-hour decline of 0.16%.

item.title: Horizen's ZEN Token Officially Launches on Base Network
item.description: On July 24th, the veteran privacy-focused public blockchain Horizen announced that its native token ZEN has officially completed the migration and has been listed on the mainstream DEXs on the Base chain, such as Uniswap and AerodromeFi, and is now ready for trading.Since 2017, Horizen has been deeply engaged in zero-knowledge and privacy technology and is widely recognized in the industry as a privacy OG project. This migration to Base indicates its formal entry into the mainstream Layer 2 DeFi world and will promote Private DeFi applications through the Thrive Protocol, with an initial investment of 1 million ZEN for ecosystem development.Currently, ZEN is strongly supported by Coinbase, Binance, and Grayscale Trust, which provides strong liquidity and institutional endorsement.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Falls Below $3600
item.description: On July 24th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum dropped below $3,600, experiencing a 24-hour decrease of 1.70%.

item.title: On-chain ASP price is currently $0.382, with a market cap of $87 million.
item.description: On July 24th, Binance Alpha has now initiated Aspecta (ASP). Currently, ASP is trading at $0.382 on the blockchain, and its market capitalization is $87 million.

item.title: Gate Launchpad will list Ika (IKA), supporting USD1 and GT subscriptions
item.description: On July 24th, as per the official announcement, Gate Launchpad is set to launch Ika (IKA) from 13:00 on July 26th, 2025, to 13:00 on July 29th, 2025 (in UTC+8 time). Users will be able to participate in the IKA token sale by using USD1 and GT. The subscription price is 0.025 USD1, and the total subscription amount is 200 million IKA.The GT subscription price will be determined based on the opening average price of GT on July 24th, 25th, and 26th (in UTC+8 time), and will be announced 2 hours prior to the start of the subscription. The maximum token amount per person is 2,000,000 IKA, and the distribution will be completed within 4 hours after the end of the subscription.Meanwhile, Gate will list the Ika (IKA) spot trading on July 29th, 2025, at 18:00 (in UTC+8 time), opening the IKA/USD1 trading pair. In addition, Gate Launchpad has launched a newcomer event from now until August 1st, 2025, at 00:00 (in UTC+8 time). During this period, registration and trading can share 2,000 GT, and

item.title: Binance Alpha has now launched Aspecta (ASP)
item.description: On July 24th, Binance Alpha has now introduced Aspecta (ASP).

item.title: SlowMist: Core Administrator of the world's largest dark web crime platform XSS arrested
item.description: On July 24th, according to the Chief Information Security Officer of SlowMist Technology, 23pds. The core administrator of the world's largest dark web crime platform, XSS, was arrested. This platform has been operating on the dark web for a long time and is one of the main trading hubs for Stealer tools (information stealers) targeting the cryptocurrency industry.The suspect has been active for approximately 20 years and has earned 7 million euros through cybercrime. The operation was led by France and received support from Europol.
